bibl.title: The Mysterious Fayum Portraits. Faces from Ancient Egypt. Foreword by Dorothy J. THOMPSON.
bibl.note: I. Graeco-Roman Egypt. - II. The Portraits. - III. The Find-Sites. - Commentaries on the Portraits. - Pp. 229-233 et 239-240: Problems in the Dating of the Mummy Portraits, by Barbara BORG.
bibl.seg: DOXIADIS Euphrosyne, The Mysterious Fayum Portraits. Faces from Ancient Egypt. Foreword by Dorothy J. THOMPSON.
London, Thames and Hudson, 1995, 4°, 248 pp., 124 ill. coul., 150 ill. n./bl. ISBN 0-500-23713-1. £48.
I. Graeco-Roman Egypt. - II. The Portraits. - III. The Find-Sites. - Commentaries on the Portraits. - Pp. 229-233 et 239-240: Problems in the Dating of the Mummy Portraits, by Barbara BORG.
C.R. par Robert Steven Bianchi, Archaeology 48 (1995) No. 6, pp. 60-66, 2 figg. et 1 pl. coul. (collectif).
